TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Executor extends System.Object
public ref class Executor abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供叫用 (Invoke) 編輯器的命令執行函式。

span.span: Provides command execution functions for invoking compilers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供可用來從通常叫用編譯器的方法集合實作。This class provides a collection of methods that can be used to invoke a compiler, typically from an implementation. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的連結要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For more information, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md).

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

param.name: cmd
param.span: 要執行的命令。

span.span: The command to execute.

param.name: tempFiles
param.span: 可用來管理與儲存在編譯期間產生的中繼檔案的參考。

span.span: A with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.

summary.span: 使用指定的暫存檔來執行命令，並等候呼叫傳回。

span.span: Executes the command using the specified temporary files and waits for the call to return.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
Executes the specified command.

param.span: 要執行的命令。

span.span: The command to execute.

param.name: tempFiles
param.span: 可用來管理與儲存在編譯期間產生的中繼檔案的參考。

span.span: A with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.

param.name: outputName
param.span: 字串的參考，將儲存編譯器的訊息輸出。

span.span: A reference to a string that will store the compiler's message output.

param.name: errorName
param.span: 字串的參考，將儲存發生的錯誤名稱。

span.span: A reference to a string that will store the name of the error or errors encountered.

summary.span: 使用指定的暫存檔來執行指定的命令，並等待呼叫傳回，將編譯器的輸出和錯誤資訊儲存在指定的字串。

span.span: Executes the specified command using the specified temporary files and waits for the call to return, storing output and error information from the compiler in the specified strings.
The return value from the compiler.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

param.span: 要執行的命令。

span.span: The command to execute.

param.span: 可用來管理與儲存在編譯期間產生的中繼檔案的參考。

span.span: A reference to a string that will store the name of the error or errors encountered.

summary.span: 使用指定的使用者語彙基元和暫存檔來執行指定的命令，並等候呼叫傳回，將編譯器的輸出和錯誤資訊儲存在指定的字串。

span.span: Executes the specified command using the specified user token and temporary files, and waits for the call to return, storing output and error information from the compiler in the specified strings.
The return value from the compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `userToken`參數接受 Win32 安全性存取語彙基元，表示要啟動處理序的安全性內容。The `userToken` parameter accepts a Win32 security access token that indicates the security context for the process to be started in. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Windows`CreateProcessAsUser`方法在 MSDN Platform SDK 文件中的文件。For more information, consult the Windows `CreateProcessAsUser` method documentation in the Platform SDK documentation in MSDN.
